text:
Machine learning and deep learning methods may still achieve better performance on speciﬁc
univariate time series problems and should be evaluated. The study does not look at more
complex time series problems, such as those datasets with:
 Complex irregular temporal structures.
 Missing observations
 Heavy noise.
 Complex interrelationships between multiple variates.
